neu:sampleInfo.neu:title: Licensing tutorials
neu:sampleInfo.neu:description: Licensing tutorials explain usage of Neurotechnology Licensing API.[br] The following tutorials are provided:[br] [b]DongleInfo[/b] - demonstrates how to enumerate connected dongles and view licenses they contain.[br] [b]IdGeneration[/b] - demonstrates how to generate Id from serial number (either generated using LicenseManager API or given by Neurotechnology or distributor).[br] [b]IdInfo[/b] - demonstrates id information retrieval from id file.[br] [b]LicenseActivation[/b] - demonstrates license activation online using generated diagnostics Id.[br] [b]LicenseActivationFromDongle[/b] - demonstrates license activation from dongle.[br] [b]LicenseDeactivation[/b] - demonstrates license deactivation process.[br] [b]SerialNumberGenerationFromDongle[b] - demonstrates serial number generation for given sequence number and product id.[br]
